content: Hi all, some search params (such as those on Patient http://hl7.org/fhir/patient.html#search) have inconsistent formats (birthdate vs death-date). There's also typos in some of the descriptions. Is there any active discussion/work around this? If so could someone point me toward it?

The way to report typos would be to open an issue at https://jira.hl7.org/projects/FHIR/issues In my opinion inconsistencies are not an issue - but you can open an issue for that as well if you think they are (but I sure hope the spec won't change due to that).
we have a standard but some are not being fixed because of legacy reasons
